meanings.definition: The branch of applied chemistry concerned with preparing industrial products from agricultural raw materials.
meanings.sent1: Chemurgy involves creating useful items from farm resources.
meanings.sent2: In chemurgy, scientists transform crops into materials for industry.
meanings.sent3: The chemurgy experts turned corn into plastic, a-maize-ing!
meanings.sent4: Her innovative chemurgy skills spun straw into gold for the company.
meanings.sent5: The magic of chemurgy turned soybeans into sustainable packaging.

meanings.definition: The production of industrial materials and products from agricultural raw materials.
meanings.sent1: Farmers benefit from chemurgy by turning crops into goods.
meanings.sent2: Chemurgy plays a vital role in creating products from farm resources.
meanings.sent3: The chemurgy process made wheat into wonders, flour power!
meanings.sent4: The company's success was built on the foundation of chemurgy.
meanings.sent5: The possibilities of chemurgy are endless when it comes to innovation.
